text: Student of the Year 2 is a 2019 Indian Hindi-language teen romantic comedy drama movie directed by Punit Malhotra. This movie is a stand-alone sequel to Student of the Year, which was released in 2012, and stars Tiger Shroff, Tara Sutaria, and Ananya Panday in lead roles. Aditya Seal and Harsh Beniwal play the supporting roles. The movie marks the debuts of Tara Sutaria and Ananya Panday. In this film, Rohan (Tiger Shroff) follows his lover, Mridula (Tara Sutaria), to St Teresa's college hoping to reunite with her. There, he befriends Manav (Aditya Seal), the most popular student, but is constantly at loggerheads with his sister, Shreya (Ananya Panday). The movie released on May 10, 2019 and opened to negative reviews. However, the movie was somewhat successful at the box office. It was mainly due to Tiger Shroff's action sequences being credited well. Panday and Sutaria were also credited well for their debuts and won multiple awards. == Cast == * Tiger Shroff as Rohan Sachdev * Tara Sutaria as Mridula 'Mia' Chawla * Ananya Panday as Shreya Randhawa * Aditya Seal as Manav Singh Randhawa * Samir Soni as Principal Gujral * Gul Panag as Coach Kuljeet * Abhishek Bajaj as Abhishek Sharma * Manoj Pahwa as Coach Mahipal * Ayesha Raza Mishra as Principal Archana Singh * Rajesh Kumar as Prem Narayan Sachdev * Manasi Joshi Roy as Rohan's aunt * Chetan Pandit as Sukesh Randhawa * Samreen Kaur as Mia's mother * Manjot Singh as Commentator Dimpy * Sahil Anand as Commentator Jeet Khurana * Daljeet Singh as Abdullah Wahab * Harsh Beniwal as Puggi * Alia Bhatt in a special appearance * Will Smith in a special appearance == References == Category:2019 comedy-drama movies
title: Student of the Year 2
